articles.title: Kim Jong Il's election welcomed by foreign heads of state
articles.content: Past news

articles.title: U.S. congressman and entourage here
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's election welcomed by foreign heads of state 
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea was welcomed by foreign heads of state.
   Norodom Sihanouk, King of Cambodia, in a congratulatory  statement on Oct. 8, said that the respected marshal Kim Jong Il is the permanent saviour of Korea, the greatest hero and the only most perfect recognized successor to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who is most outstanding in the world.
   The Cambodian people and all the progressive peoples of the world are wholeheartedly rejoiced over the supreme leader Kim Jong Il's Korea greeting the most glorious new era of Juche and are expressing  the warmest and heartfelt reverence for him, he added.
   Guinean President Lansana Conte sent a floral basket to the Korean Embassy in Conakry on Oct. 9 and authorized the deputy Secretary General and the Director of Protocol of the Presidential Office to convey his most heartfelt greetings to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   The respected general is a man of probity who made great contributions to the development of bilateral relations of friendship and did me a great favour, he said, stressing that he believes that although Korea is undergoing temporary difficulties, it will shortly overcome them under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
   Floral baskets came to General Secretary Kim Jong Il from Algerian President Liamine Zeroual and Palestinian President Yasser Arafat.

articles.title: Farmers and women hail Kim Jong Il's election
articles.content:
U.S. congressman and entourage here
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Toni Hol,  member of the House of Representatives of the United States, and his entourage arrived here today by air.

articles.title: Banner indicating how to train backbone that will succeed to Juche blood
articles.content:
Farmers and women hail Kim Jong Il's election
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Farmers and women met in Pyongyang on October 13 to congratulate Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   At a celebration meeting of agricultural working people, speeches were made following a report of chairperson Choe Song Suk of the Union of Agricultural Working People of Korea Central Committee. 
   The reporter and speakers said that with the respected comrade Kim Jong Il elected as Party General Secretary, the Korean people have become the most proud and happiest people who are blessed with the illustrious leader and great  Party generation after generation, and have bright prospects for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
   They called upon all the agricultural working people to uphold him for all ages with purest conscience, become loyal and dutiful to him and sacrifice themselves for him, if necessary. 
   They stressed that all the union officials and agricultural working people should vigorously struggle for the prosperity of the fatherland and for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche, firmly rallied around him. 
   At a meeting of members of the women's union, Vice-Chairperson Han Kye Ok of the Korean Democratic Women's Union Central Committee made a report. She and speakers said that the great comrade Kim Jong Il's official election as Party General Secretary is a great fortune for Korean people. On behalf of the women and all other people, they extended highest glory and warmest thanks to comrade Kim Jong Il. 
   They called for further improving the work of the union and fully discharging the duty and mission of the union, true to his high intention. 
   A pledge and a letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Floral basket and letter to Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il from Chinese trade mission in Korea
articles.content:
Banner indicating how to train backbone that will succeed to Juche blood
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today dedicates an editorial to the letter of General Secretary Kim Jong Il to the teaching staff and pupils of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School.
  General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a letter "Mangyongdae Revolutionary School is a centre for training the backbone that will succeed to the Juche blood" to the teaching staff and pupils of the school on the 50th anniversary of its foundation.
   The editorial says:
   In the letter, comrade Kim Jong Il reviewed the proud 50 years of the school and indicated the way of effecting a new turn in the training of the backbone that will succeed to the Juche blood.
   The main idea of the letter is that the Juche blood should be inherited and the Juche revolution started in thick forests of Mt. Paektu be completed, true to the policy of the great leader President Kim Il Sung and the Workers' Party of Korea on education for the bereaved children of revolutionaries.
   The letter indicates how the school should train the reserve cadres who will become the backbone that will succeed to the revolution and shoulder the future of the country and the hardcore of the revolutionary armed forces.
   The letter deals with the school's main revolutionary task and other tasks of intensifying politico-ideological education, turning the education into the one for gifted children and strengthening education in basic sciences and military affairs and art and physical education.
   The letter also says that the methods of education should be improved constantly, the teachers of the school should enhance their responsibility and role, the whole Party, the whole country and all the people should pay attention to the education of the bereaved children of revolutionaries and Party organisations of the school should give proper oolitical and policy guidance to education at the school.
   The letter will serve as an important guide in developing the education of the bereaved children of revolutionaries on to a higher stage.

articles.title: Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il elected Honorary Chairman of SRPP
articles.content:
Floral basket and letter to Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il from Chinese trade mission in Korea
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Chinese Jilin Trade mission in Korea sent a floral basket and a congratulatory letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il as regards his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The floral basket and the letter were handed to an official concerned on Monday.

articles.title: Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il awarded order of October Revolution
articles.content:
Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il elected Honorary Chairman of SRPP
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The socialist revolutionary Party of Peru decided to elect General Secretary Kim Jong Il its honorary chairman as regards his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   A certificate on electing him honorary chairman was handed to the Korean Ambassador to Peru on Oct. 10.
   The certificate said:   
   "The Socialist Revolutionary Party of Peru decides to award the title of its honorary chairman to comrade Kim Jong Il for his precious  exploits for the supreme cause of socialism and his election as WPK General Secretary."

articles.title: Russian Ambassador gives party
articles.content:
Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il awarded order of October Revolution
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was awarded the order of October Revolution by the permanent presidium of the Congress of peoples' deputies of the USSR.
   A decree of the permanent presidium dated Oct. 9 noted that on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the great october socialist revolution they decided to award the order of October revolution to General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and Supreme commander of the Korean people's Army marshal Kim Jong Il for his outstanding contribution to the development of communist theory, the cause of building socialism and the strengthening of solidarity of the international working-class movement and communist movement.

articles.title: Celebrations continue in Korea
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador gives party
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to Korea Valery Denisov gave a party on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Russian Federation on Oct. 13.
   Invited to the party were Ri In Gyu, Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
   Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Defence building is self-defensive measure: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Celebrations continue in Korea
  Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Taekwondo instructors and players on October 13 gave a model performance at the Taekwondo Hall to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The performers showed movements of team pattern, self-defensive technique and other special movements of Taekwondo, which has been consummated to suit the national characters and physical body of the Korean people.
   They also did Taekwondo exercise for health to the melodies of a song "Look at Us".
   On the same day, a national art performance of workers was given at the central house of workers.
   Put on the stage were numbers, including chorus "Song of General Kim Jong Il", an immortal revolutionary song, and "Confetti of Best Wishes", folk song chorus "We will hold the general in high esteem", dialogue and poem "Ours is the world for the sake of workers" and poem and chorus "Iron Hammer".
   The performers impressively showed the wise guidance, greatness and undying feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   Attending the functions together with working people in the city were secretary Kim Jung Rin of the WPK Central Committee, Vice-Premier Jang Chol, who is also Minister of Culture and Art, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Celebration meetings in provinces and municipality
articles.content:
Defence building is self-defensive measure: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The maintenance and strengthening of the defence power in the DPRK is a legitimate self-defensive measure to cope with the U.S. occupation of south Korea and its ceaseless threat and blackmail policy to the DPRK, Rodong Sinmun stresses today.
   The paper comments on the recently published "strategic report on national security" of the U.S., which branded the DPRK as "the most dangerous being" that has an ambition for military challenge to the U.S.
   The news analyst says:
   It is outrageous for the U.S. warmongers to describe the defence power of the DPRK as "threat."
   Now the United States is making brag of being "the only superpower in the world" and planning to invade the DPRK. If we sit idle with folded arms in this situation, it means we ask for death.
   We cannot but increase our self-reliant defence capabilities as long as the United States, which is technically at war with the DPRK, reinforces its forces in south Korea and its vicinity and steps up military threat and war preparations against the DPRK, without rectifying its aggressive policy toward the DPRK.
   To counter strength with strength is our revolutionary principle and position.
   The United States must discard its foolish attempt to stifle the DPRK with strength.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's election hailed by ambassadors to Korea
articles.content:
Celebration meetings in provinces and municipality 
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Celebration meetings took place in Ryanggang Province ,Jagang Province , South Hwanghae Province, Kangwon Province and North Hamgyong Province and Kaesong on October 13 to welcome General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   Chief secretaries of provincial and municipal Party committees and representatives of people from all walks of life spoke at the meetings.
   They said all the Party members, working people and youths and students in provinces and municipality extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his election .
   At the celebration meeting in Ryanggang Province the speakers said all the people should cherish the pride and honor of having General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the head of the Party and the revolution and take the lead in achieving innovative successes in the honorable struggle to exalt the new era of the Juche revolution.
   At the celebration meeting in Jagang Province the speakers called for safeguarding General Secretary Kim Jong Il politically, ideologically and at the risk of lives in reliance upon the spirit displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters in defending the leader with their lives and for thoroughly implementing the Party's revolutionary economic strategy by displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and hard work and the spirit of revolutionary soldiers.
   The speakers, addressing the celebration meeting in South Hwanghae Province, said as South Hwanghae Province holds a lion's share in the nation's production of agriculture, the province should direct primary efforts to the production of grain so as to uphold the Party with rice and bring about greater prosperity of the country and the motherland.
   At the celebration meeting in Kangwon Province the speakers said thanks to the energetic guidance and great loving care of the general who gave on-the-spot guidance to the work of the province with the blueprint to build a recreation ground for the sake of the people, radical changes have taken place and Wonsan has been built into a magnificent and beautiful city.
   At the celebration meeting in North Hamgyong Province the speakers said the wise guidance and tireless efforts of the general resulted in increasing the production capacity in all aspects of the national economy, including metallurgical, electric power, coal, machine building and chemical industries in the province. They called for effecting a new upswing in the production of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and other key industrial domains, agriculture and fisheries and thus exalt the great honor and happiness with practical successes.
   At the celebration meeting in Kaesong the speakers called For cherishing the great national pride and honor of having the general at the head of the Party and the revolution and finishing autumn harvesting and thrashing at present and developing light industry, increasing the production of mass consumer goods, stepping up the production of export goods and bringing about a radical improvement of the people's living standard.
   Letters to General Secretary Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Korea in delight
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's election hailed by ambassadors to Korea
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Ambassadors of Iran, Pakistan and Egypt here gave receptions on October 13 to congratulate as General Secretary Kim Jong Il of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   Iranian Ambassador Mohammad Ganjidoost, addressing the reception, said with comrade Kim Jong Il elected as WPK General Secretary the Korean people will, in the future, chalk up greater success, adding that under his guidance the relations between the two countries will enter a new stage of development.
   Vice-President of the DPRK Ri Jong Ok said comrade Kim Jong Il has always paid deep attention to the development of the friendly relations with Iran which were forged in the common struggle for independence against imperialism. All efforts will be made as ever to further expand and develop the relationship with Iran in various fields, as comrade Kim Jong Il wishes, he added.
   Pakistani Ambassador Rehmdil Bhatti extended heartfelt congratulations to General                                                                                                  Secretary Kim Jong Il of the Workers' Party of Korea. He expressed the conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will continue developing in the future, too, under guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   In his reply, Vice-Premier and Foreign Minister Kim Yong Nam said, "it is our invariable stand to further expand and develop the relations of friendship and cooperation with the Pakistani government and people in various fields." he went on to say that the Pakistani people under the leadership of beloved President Sardar Farooq Ahmed Legari have made a great progress in the efforts for the independent development and prosperity of the country.
   Egyptian Ambassador Mohamed Amin Mohamed Gabr said the election of comrade Kim Jong Il at the head of the Party is the greatest event. Under the guidance of the revolutionary Workers' Party of Korea, Korea will register the most wonderful success in the era of comrade Kim Jong Il, he added.
   Secretary Choe Thae Bok of the WPK Central Committee said, "the Egyptian National Democratic Party and the Egyptian people under the guidance of respected President Mubarak have gained many successes in the efforts to achieve the national unity and cohesion and build a thriving , new Egypt. "
 He expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two parties and two countries will, in the future, too , continue to develop favourably thanks to the concerned efforts.

articles.title: Meeting to welcome delegation of Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association
articles.content:
Korea in delight
   Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Korea is overwhelmed with great joy and enthusiasm at the election of General Secretary Kim Jong Il of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   Set up in Pyongyang, provinces, cities, counties, streets and villages of the country are  boards of "the highest glory to the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il," "Long live general Kim Jong Il, the sun of the 21st century !", 
"Let us defend the headquarters of the revolution headed by comrade Kim Jong Il with our lives !", "honor of Korea", "Congratulations to comrade Kim Jong Il on his election as WPK General Secretary", "Welcome and felicitation" and other slogans and posters, large picture boards and special wallpapers. The decorations and flags put up in different places and a variety of blossoms in flower stands at crossroads add to the delight of the people at the great event of the nation= people dancing for joy and shouting "Hurrah !" flowers in their hands.
   Colorful functions have taken place in different places of the country to welcome General Secretary Kim Jong Il of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   A meeting was held with attendance of hundreds of thousands of Pyongyangites at Kim Il Sung Square in the capital city of Pyongyang.  A meeting of officers and men of the three services of the Korean People's Army took place and then celebration meetings were held in succession under the sponsorship of working people's organisations and at provinces, cities, counties, factories, enterprises, universities and colleges and on cooperative farms.
   A celebration meeting of youths and students in Pyongyang  and a joint national meeting of organisations of the Korean Children's Union were grandly held at the May Day Stadium and the Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang to welcome General Secretary  Kim Jong Il of the Workers' Party of Korea. The Phibada Opera Troupe, the Pyongyang Circus, the youth song and dance ensemble and other art troupes and art propaganda squads gave performances at plazas in front of the three revolution exhibition, the April 25 House of Culture and the monument to war victory and around the munsu fun fair and youths, students and working people danced every day.
   A performance "Honor of Korea" by artists, a  performance "glory to the respected father general Kim Jong Il" by schoolchildren, model performances "we will follow the great general forever" and "honor of holding the great general in high esteem"  by figure skaters and synchronised swimmers are given before full houses at the Pyongyang Circus Theatre, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, the ice rink and the Changgwang Health Complex.
   A national art show and a photo exhibition which have opened at the Korean Art Gallery and the People's Palace of Culture draw a lot of people day after day.
   The visitors have been deeply moved by the traits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as a great brilliant commander.
   Various sports games go on at stadiums and gymnasiums amidst the deep concern of people from all walks of life, school youths and children and sports fans.
   All the participants in the functions, working people, youths and students throughout the country and officers and men of the Korean People's Army are determined to absolutely trust and follow only General Secretary Kim Jong Il and accomplish the Juche revolution under his guidance.

articles.title: Highly important work indicating path of revolutionary Party building
articles.content:
Meeting to welcome delegation of Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association
  Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held here on October 13 to welcome the visiting delegation of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association led by its Chairman Anders Kristensen.
   Chairman Jong Tong Uk of the DPRK-Denmark Friendship Association said in his speech that over the past 29 years since the association was formed, the association has endeavored to strengthen the friendly relations between the peoples of the two countries and extended support and encouragement to the Korean people's efforts for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. He expressed thanks for this. 
  He expressed the belief  that the association will pay deep attention to the just cause of the Korean people and extend firm solidarity to them in the future, too.
   The head of the delegation said in his speech that the election of the great leader comrade Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea is the realisation of the aspiration and desire not only of the Korean people but also of the progressive people. With comrade Kim Jong Il elected as Party General Secretary, the Juche line propounded and developed by the great leader comrade Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, will be maintained, he added. 
   Noting that he extends full support to comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leader  of the WPK, the army and all the Korean people, he expressed belief that the Korean people will overcome all kinds of difficulties and certainly achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and complete the socialist cause under his wise leadership.

articles.title: Sinking "New Korea Party"
articles.content:
Highly important work indicating path of revolutionary Party building
  Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today dedicates a signed article to the fifth anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's Immortal famous work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building".
   The work, which was published by General Secretary Kim Jong Il on October 10, Juche 81 (1992), gives a deep-going analysis and review of historical lessons drawn in the building of a socialist ruling Party and a perfect exposition of basic principles that the Workers' Party of Korea has always maintained in the building of a Juche-based revolutionary Party and their validity and important matters of principle arising in the strengthening of international unity and solidarity.
   The main idea of the work is that only when efforts are made to hew out the revolutionary path of Party building with the Juche-based theory, is it possible to build a working-class Party into the most revolutionary, militant Party to meet the requirements of the era of independence, to steadily enhance the leadership role of the Party and to triumphantly advance the cause of socialism, the article says, and goes on:
   The vitality of the work is more keenly felt day by day in the building of a revolutionary Party in the present era and in the accomplishment of the cause of socialism.
   It is of great importance that the work elucidates the idea that a working-class Party should make strenuous efforts to develop the theory of Party building in keeping with the requirements of the time and the developing revolution.
   With the work giving a clear exposition of the causes of the collapse of the socialist ruling parties in some countries and the historic lessons drawn from the tragic event, the revolutionary parties came to have a good understandning of the idea that when they base themselves on the preceding theory of the working-class Party building they cannot build a revolutionary, militant Party suitable to the new time. And many revolutionary parties came to find out the path of building a revolutionary Party in the era of independence, putting a period to the old history of Party building.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's election welcomed in Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Sinking "New Korea Party"
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today comments on the fact that the "New Korea Party" of south Korea is on the verge of total collapse.
   The news analyst says:
   It is natural that the private Party of the traitor Kim Young Sam, who is eking out a precarious living, has been driven to a tight corner.
   Recently, many people deserted the "New Korea Party." 
Among them were 14 central permanent members, 126 other central members and 13 chairmen of Party branches.
   The "New Korea Party" is a group of power-hungry politicians who have no political philosophy and ideology.
   Although Kim Young Sam plans to fabricate "Victory of the New Korea Party" at the "Presidential Election" slated for late this year and ensure his safety after retirement, his plan is coming to a failure. There is no way out for him now. 
   The ruin of the Kim Young Sam regime and the "New Korea Party" is inevitable and doubtless. Kim Young Sam had better explode the wrecked ship "New Korea Party" and himself before it is too late.

articles.title: Synchronized swimming in Korea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's election welcomed in Zimbabwe
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A committee was inaugurated in Harare, Zimbabwe to welcome General Secretary Kim Jong Il of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The national President of the central committee of the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front was elected honorary chairman of the committee and chairman of the Zimbabwean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, chairman of the committee.
   The inaugural meeting decided to organize colorful events.
   An appeal to political parties, public organizations and organizations of friendship and solidarity with the Korean people the world over was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's election hailed by foreign public figures
articles.content:
Synchronized swimming in Korea
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The swimming-pool of the Changgwang Health complex on the bank of Pothong River in Pyongyang is now crowded with synchronized swimming fans.
   Secretary of the Korean Synchronized Swimming Association An So Dan said that synchronized swimming in Korea is much promising, though its history is short.
   The performance of synchronized swimming "honor of holding  the great general in high esteem" on Oct. 9 was Highly acclaimed.
   Nearly one hundred young girls participated in the performance.
   "General on Mt. Paektu", "Party, Motherly bossom" and "Iron-Willed Courage" and others won warm applause for the delicate and refined movements and high skills of the players.
   General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave teachings on developing synchronized swimming ten years ago.
   From Juche 77 (1988) synchronized swimmers have been trained by different sports groups. 
   Training facilities have been set up at the swimming gymnasium in the Chongchun Street and other places.
   The synchronized swimming became a sports event at the "Mangyongdae Prize" sports contest and other local competitions from Juche 79 (1990). 
   A national model performance of synchronized swimming takes place in Feb. Every year from Juche 85 (1996).
   This provides swimmers and coaches with a good chance to enhance technical level and study and perfect the methods of training and competition.
   The Korean players gave a good account of themselves at the 16th International Synchronized Swimming contest for "Women's World" magazine prize held in Russia in March, Juche 86 (1997).

articles.title: Worldwide congratulations to Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's election hailed by foreign public figures
Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il of the Workers' Party of Korea was hailed by foreign public figures.
   Chairman of the National Council of Nepal Beni Bahadur Karki said in a press statement on Oct. 10: 
   "Comrade Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea is the realization of the wish and desire of the Korean people as well as the revolutionary peoples of the world who love peace. "
   "A lot of people in the world are learning from the political philosophy and ideas and theories of comrade Kim Jong Il, praising them as "Torchlight of the present era", "A lever moving the earth" and "A locomotive advancing history".
   "Humankind are boundlessly respecting and revering comrade Kim Jong Il as the great sun in the era of independence and the great leader who will guide the 21st century."
   "His name will remain forever in the hearts of the world progressive humankind as he leads the Workers' Party of Korea".
   Jorgen Petersen, Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Denmark (Marxist-Leninist), said in a special statement on Oct. 9 :
 "The WPK election of comrade Kim Jong Il as General Secretary is a powerful demonstration of the will to carry forward the revolutionary idea and cause of the great President Kim Il Sung and a clear expression of reverence and respect of all the Party members and people of Korea for comrade Kim Jong Il."

articles.title: Poem dedicated to Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Worldwide congratulations to Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the news that the great comrade Kim Jong Il was elected as the General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, people around the world sincerely congratulate him day by day.
   The General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the First Secretary of the C. C., the Communist Party of Cuba, the King of Cambodia, the Syrian President, the Guinean President and many other Party and state leaders sent congratulatory messages to General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
   The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China sent a floral basket to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Oct. 8 after the special communique of the central committee and Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea was published.
   The King of Cambodia, the Guinean President, the coordinator (leader) of the National Executive Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico and other State and Party leaders sent floral baskets to Korean embassies in their countries and foreign delegations including Bangladesh and Algeria and political and public figures paid congratulatory visits to Korean embassies there.
   No sooner had the special communique been published than a joint congratulatory statement was issued by over 20 political parties and organizations in Peru. And the Central Committee of the Communist Party-KPML of Sweden held an emergency executive committee meeting for welcome and adopted a congratulatory message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   In over 40 countries such as Togo, Equatorial Guinea, Zimbabwe, Madagascar and Yugoslavia, committees for supporting and welcoming the election have been formed and various events organized amid great expectation and concern of the governments and political parties.
   Many political Party and organization leaders and public figures over the world issued statements as soon as the special communique was published and expressed their excitement on various occasions and mass media give publicity to the news.
   The Chairman of the C.C., the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the chairman of the council of the union of communist parties-the communist Party of the Soviet Union and the chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia expressed their pleasure over the election of comrade Kim Jong Il as the supreme leader of the Korean people and emphasized that this is a great event in the development of the international communist movement.
   The Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to support the reunification of Korea adopted a congratulatory resolution the day when the special communique was published.
   Mass media around the world including Xinhua, Itar-Tass, AP, UPI, NHK TV and Radio, Kyodo, Reuter and BBC began to report the news of election in less than an hour after the Pyongyang report.
   According to available data, 400 odd mass media in some 60 countries including China, Cuba, Russia, Syria, Indonesia, Bulgaria, Italy, Algeria, Senegal and Peru gave special publicity to the news that the great leader general Kim Jong Il was elected as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea in a day after the special communique was published.

articles.title: Ukrainian delegation arrives
articles.content:
Poem dedicated to Gen.- Secy. Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Han Tok Su, Chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), dedicated a poem to the great leader general Kim Jong Il on his election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The poem deals with the cheers of 700,000 Koreans in Japan and five million overseas Koreans for general Kim Jong Il, the sun of guidance, who has been elected to the top post of the Juche cause. It also reflects their congratulations to him.
   The poem describes the general as the sun and the symbol of fortune who opened a blue sky after the loss of a great man.
   Led by the general, Korea is famous worldwide for strong ideology, great politics, powerful military strength, economic prosperity, cultural development and ideal morality and loyalty, the poem says.
   He is the greatest man, the most brilliant general and the noblest-hearted man, and he is the sun of the 21st century, the poem says.
   It adds that he lights the path of humankind with the rays of Juche, meets the challenges of the allied forces of imperialism, works miracles of Korean style and strikes people with admiration.
   In the 21st century, all roads and events will begin from him and lead to him, and every glory and miracle will be linked with his wish, according to the poem.
   Juche Korea will prosper as an ideal society where the people are regarded as god, and the strongest country that leads formidable enemies by the nose. Korea will be reunified, thanks to the general's high authority, the poem says.
   The poem stresses that Chongryon will follow him without vacillation, no matter which way the wind may blow.
